com.cigital.insecurepay.DBHelper

Class ActivityHistoryDBHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.DBHelper
        • com.cigital.insecurepay.DBHelper.ActivityHistoryDBHelper

  • public class ActivityHistoryDBHelper
extends DBHelper
    ActivityHistoryDBHelper is a class that extends DBHelper is used to add entries to 'Transfers' table. It dumps all the transfer details brought from the server when requested for checking transaction history.

        public void addTransfer(TransactionVO transactionVO,
